short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The premise is not exactly rocket science: eat fruit, grow bigger, and keep the clock running

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The premise is not exactly rocket science: eat fruit, grow bigger, and keep the clock running. If you’re constantly turning around because you missed a piece, you won’t last (or grow) very long. Oh, and be weary of accidentally biting yourself! Two times is okay, but after the third time, there won’t be anything left to bite. Best of luck, and may your fruit snake grow long and prosper.
